ValidationRule.description: Ensures an Opportunity CloseDate is not the past date. This is validated before progressing opportunity from "Identify" to "Qualify" stage and beyond (OR) when the CloseDate is being updated with the past date on opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Sales Admin", NOT(ISNEW()), OR(ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISCHANGED(CloseDate)), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Identify"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Qualify"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Propose"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ), CloseDate < Today() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Update the Close Date to a future date. This date should indicate the best estimate of when the opportunity is expected to close.
